General.Name: Amata Corporation Public Company Limited
General.Description: Amata Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the planning, developing, managing, and marketing of industrial estates in Thailand and internationally. The company also produces, distributes, and treats water for industrial use; provides management services in common area; operates a school; and constructs factory for rent. In addition, it operates as a REIT manager. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
